means: 讥笑，冷笑( sneer的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The old sorceress slunk in with a sneering smile.
sentence.Network_cn: 老女巫鬼鬼崇崇地走进来,冷冷一笑.

sentence.Network_en: The ladies'servant stood apart, with a sneering expression on his face.
sentence.Network_cn: 女士们带来的佣人站在一旁, 满脸鄙夷之色.

PerfectNetExp.abs: sneer 冷笑sneering 嘲笑的sneeringly 嘲笑地
the wife is sneering to say ., 妻子冷笑着说.

as soon as I was back again he returned to his former manner , half fawning , half sneering , patted me on the shoulder , told me I was a good boy , and he had taken quite a fancy to me .我一进屋，他脸上又恢复了原来的神情，他拍了拍我的肩膀，半讨好半嘲讽地说我是个好孩子，还说他很喜欢我。

list.abs: However , there are still some people who sneer at it ., 但是仍然有少数人对其不屑一顾.
when they have no one to trample on and sneer at , the truth is revealed , the ugliness in them arises .当他们无人可以踩踏和嘲笑的时候，真相就显而易见了，他们内在的丑陋就会暴露。
The peers queer peering is a sheer sneer ., 贵族奇怪的窥视是一次完全的嘲笑.
It is very discouraging to be sneered at all the time ., 总被人嘲笑是很让人灰心的.
We can just dispose of such slander with a sneer ., 对这种诬蔑我们只好一笑置之.

entry.def: If you sneer at someone or something, you express your contempt for them by the expression on your face or by what you say.

example.ex: There is too great a readiness to sneer at anything the Opposition does...
example.tran: 对反对党的任何举动都想加以嘲笑的心理过于急切了。

example.ex: If you go to a club and you don't look right, you're sneered at...
example.tran: 如果你去夜总会却穿得不合时宜，人家会笑你的。

sentences.sentence: "curled his lip in a supercilious smile"
"makes many a sharp comparison but never a mean or snide one"

auth_sentence.content: Your statement is sneering and dismissive, and so is doubly unpersuasive.
auth_sentence.res_content: Your statement is sneering and dismissive, and so is doubly unpersuasive.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Your statement is sneering and dismissive, and so is doubly unpersuasive.

auth_sentence.content: The Bogeyman is English, sneering and perfectly voiced by Jude Law.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Bogeyman is English, sneering and perfectly voiced by Jude Law.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Bogeyman is English, sneering and perfectly voiced by Jude Law.
